title: About the next upcoming champion...
body:
It's been around 2 months+ since release of Rek'Sazzi...shouldn't we by now at least have a small leak/teaser of the next champion or something??


{{champion:120}} {{champion:120}} {{champion:120}}

replies.body: Considering the amount of work Riot is putting into making the DJ {{champion:37}}  skin, I wouldn't be surprised if we don't see a new champ for a little while.

different departments...but ok...

im hoping its ao shin finally.

Why don't they just steal the rest of Smite's character line up?

It's bad enough that Smite stooped to the level of using Wu Kong's entire being (Minus the kit)...

But really Rito?...

I made up better characters that I actually spoke to when I was institutionalized.

> [{quoted}](name=Space Cowboy,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=cuZG05FY,comment-id=000100000001,timestamp=2015-02-15T01:13:39.948+0000)
>
> Why don't they just steal the rest of Smite's character line up?
> 
> It's bad enough that Smite stooped to the level of using Wu Kong's entire being (Minus the kit)...
> 
> But really Rito?...
> 
> I made up better characters that I actually spoke to when I was institutionalized.

lol, League didn't make up Wukong. He's from mythology. HOW DARE SMITE USE MYTHOLOGY!
Why not just stoop to the lowest level and make Jesus then, for crying out loud?

> [{quoted}](name=Space Cowboy,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=cuZG05FY,comment-id=00010000000100010000,timestamp=2015-02-18T09:04:15.928+0000)
>
> Why not just stoop to the lowest level and make Jesus then, for crying out loud?

Soraka with a 72 hour CD Zilean ult?

Nah, it's a reverse Karthus ult. 

JC can crucifies himself for everyone's sins, and revives all allies that have died within the last 30 seconds, where they died, at full HP, with a WWJD buff.
He then takes on a triple death penalty.

> [{quoted}](name=Space Cowboy,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=cuZG05FY,comment-id=0001000000010001000000000000,timestamp=2015-02-18T09:13:12.334+0000)
>
> Nah, it's a reverse Karthus ult. 
> 
> JC can crucifies himself for everyone's sins, and revives all allies that have died within the last 30 seconds, where they died at full HP, with a WWJD buff.

To be honest, a character who can sacrifice themself to revive a teammate would be an interesting mechanic. I think that could be a thing, but only like a single target thing.

> [{quoted}](name=Space Cowboy,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=cuZG05FY,comment-id=000100000001,timestamp=2015-02-15T01:13:39.948+0000)

> It's bad enough that Smite stooped to the level of using Wu Kong's entire being (Minus the kit)...

It's almost as if they were based of the exact same thing...

Ao Shin is currently on hold as they can't figure out its hitbox and how it would interacts with champions on the rift since it is more lengthy than any other champ.

They're more focused towards champ reworks than anything else. Champ rework is tantamount a new champ being released.
It takes alot of time dude. Last year there was about what, 4 champs or somewhere near there that were released..

> [{quoted}](name=VENI VIDI VICI,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=cuZG05FY,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2015-02-14T08:40:17.398+0000)
>
> It takes alot of time dude. Last year there was about what, 4 champs or somewhere near there that were released..

It doesn't take as much time as you may think, Riot have just been slowing down the champion releases to 8 or so per year.

There were six, and I pretty sure a rework is coming up next, not a champ (I think its {{champion:78}} 's). So chances are there won't be a new champ teaser until at least next month. I could be very wrong though.

wasnt lucian at the beginning of last year? so thats 9....

hmm...no your right, 6. yas jinx and lucian came out in the last 3-4 months of the year, its just lucian wasnt highly played until a decent build set up for him was discovered in mid january.
Fair enough I guess...cheers for all the answers then
